item.title: Regular updates of the GOP debate.
item.description:
Regular updates of the GOP debate.

CNN hosts GOP debates at The Venetian, Las Vegas, Nevada on December 15, 2015.

item.title: Republican Debate on CNN: Meeting in Las Vegas
item.description:
Republican Debate on CNN: Meeting in Las Vegas

The so-called undercard debates have been billed as J.V. affairs, an overflow room for low-polling candidates who are trying to get out of political purgatory. On Tuesday night, four Republican presidential hopefuls will get another chance to make the case that voters should give their campaigns one last look.

item.title: On covering Pueblo's Brain Drain - PULP
item.description:
On covering Pueblo's Brain Drain - PULP

I should have had an inkling that the brain drain was bad long before this year. Maybe when I was on the verge of graduating high school in 2011 and didn't even apply to Colorado State University-Pueblo because I was determined - as were most of my friends - to make Pueblo a part of my past (spoiler, I ended up graduating from CSU-Pueblo this past May).

item.title: The workspace of PULP Spotlight artist Joshua Soto. The collages he creates now were originally an escape from graffiti. Soto tells John Bueno in this issue of PULP that the collages are more meditative. From our Instagram.

item.title: Southern Colorado From Space
item.description:
Southern Colorado From Space

Have you ever seen Colorado like this? "The Colorado front range at night - Fort Collins, Denver, Colorado Springs and Pueblo shining bright." From astronaut Kjell N. Lindgren onboard the International Space Station on December 5, 2015.
